item.title: 2022-08-12 Notes
item.description: Q: What is the appeal of repeating nursery rhyme to young children? Young children do not have the mental model to understand affordance of a toy.

item.title: 2022-07-28 Notes
item.description: I want to train a #GPT-3 Model that’s really good at asking follow up questions. This model could be used for introspection, interview or understanding purposes.

item.title: 07-27-22 Notes
item.description: Programmable currency (ie. crypto) as a way to assign value to externalities / intrinsic things. For example, carbon emission is extremely real, but very difficult quantify it… What exactly does one ton of carbon emission mean?
